attributes.action: Equal car insurance for men and women.
attributes.additional_details:
It is no secret about the discrimination faced when it comes to insuring cars. As a young student, myself and any others find it extremely difficult, bordering on impossible to save up for the high prices it costs to insure a car. Especially during this economy, where it is equally difficult to find part-time or full-time employment.

I call upon the government to ensure that insurance becomes fairer for all, and to stop the blatant discrimination against men in-particular.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the insurance industry.
